"Seasonal Events":
"Seasonal Events are special events that only last for a limited time.

During these events, the map and the appearance of some enemies will change.

In addition, the ARKS Researcher of Strange Phenomena, Xiandy, will appear near the Central Tower."
"During this Seasonal Event, an unusual hologram called a <yellow>\"Mischief Symbol\"<c> will appear somewhere in Central City."
"In addition, during this Seasonal Event, when a <yellow>Stellar Grace Collection<c> World Trial occurs, the appearance and contents of its Stellar Graces will change."

"Also, during this Seasonal Event, there will be additional Event-related Daily/Weekly Tasks.

To learn more about Seasonal Events, talk to Xiandy and select \"Ask about the Seasonal Event\"."
